00108     public function getTablePrefix()
00109     {
00110         //  Does db have one?
00111         if ( version_compare( YiiBase::getVersion(), '1.1.0' ) > 0 )
00112         {
00113             if ( null !== ( $_db = $this->getDbConnection() ) ) return $_db->tablePrefix;
00114 
00115             return null;
00116         }
00117 
00118         //  Return ours...
00119         return $this->_tablePrefix;
00120     }

00129     {
00130         if ( ! $thisTableOnly && version_compare( YiiBase::getVersion(), '1.1.0' ) > 0 && null !== ( $_db = $this->getDbConnection() ) )

00132

00165     public function setAttributes( $attributes, $safeOnly = true )
00166     {
00167         if ( version_compare( Yii::getVersion(), '1.1.0', '>=' ) )
00168         {
00169             if ( ! is_array( $attributes ) )
00170                 return;
00171 
00172             $_attributes = array_flip( $safeOnly ? $this->getSafeAttributeNames() : $this->attributeNames()  );
00173 
00174             foreach ( $attributes as $_column => $_value )
00175             {
00176                 if ( isset( $_attributes[$_column] ) )
00177                     $this->setAttribute( $_column, $_value );
00178                 else
00179                 {
00180                     if ( $this->hasProperty( $_column ) && $this->canSetProperty( $_column ) )
00181                         $this->{$_column} = $_value;
00182                 }
00183             }
00184         }
00185         else
00186         {
00187             $_scenario = ( $safeOnly ? $this->getScenario() : $safeOnly );
00188 
00189             if ( is_array( $attributes ) )
00190             {
00191                 $_attributes = array_flip( $this->getSafeAttributeNames( $_scenario ) );
00192 
00193                 foreach ( $attributes as $_column => $_value )
00194                 {
00195                     if ( isset( $_attributes[$_column] ) || ( $this->hasProperty( $_column ) && $this->canSetProperty( $_column ) ) ) $this->setAttribute( $_column, $_value );
00196                 }
00197             }
00198         }
00199     }

00222     public function hasBehavior( $className )
00223     {
00224         //  Look for behaviors
00225         foreach ( $this->behaviors() as $_column => $_behaviors )
00226         {
00227             if ( null !== ( $_class = PS::o( $_behaviors, 'class' ) ) )
00228                 $_class = Yii::import( $_class );
00229 
00230             //  Check...
00231             if ( $className == $_column || $className == $_class )
00232                 return true;
00233         }
00234 
00235         //  Nope!
00236         return false;
00237     }

00263     public function getErrorsForLogging( $attribute = null )
00264     {
00265         $_result = null;
00266         $_i = 1;
00267 
00268         $_errors = $this->getErrors( $attribute );
00269 
00270         if ( ! empty( $_errors ) )
00271         {
00272             foreach ( $_errors as $_attribute => $_error )
00273                 $_result .= $_i++ . '. [' . $_attribute . '] : ' . implode( '|', $_error );
00274         }
00275 
00276         return $_result;
00277     }

00295     public function search()
00296     {
00297         $_criteria = new CDbCriteria();
00298 
00299         foreach ( $this->getTableSchema()->columns as $_column )
00300         {
00301             if ( 'string' == $_column->type )
00302                 $_criteria->compare( $_column->name, $this->{$_column->name}, true );
00303         }
00304 
00305         return new CActiveDataProvider( $this->_modelClass, array( 'criteria' => $_criteria ) );
00306     }

00317     public static function queryAll( $criteria, $fetchAssociative = true, $parameters = array() )
00318     {
00319         if ( null !== ( $_builder = self::getDb()->getCommandBuilder() ) )
00320         {
00321             if ( null !== ( $_command = $_builder->createFindCommand( $this->getTableSchema(), $criteria ) ) )
00322                 return $_command->queryAll( $fetchAssociative, $parameters );
00323         }
00324 
00325         return null;
00326     }

00365     public function hasTransaction()
00366     {
00367         return ( 0 != count( self::$_transactionStack ) );

00375     public static function beginTransaction()
00376     {
00377         if ( version_compare( PHP_VERSION, '5.3.0' ) > 0 )
00378         {
00379             $_modelClass = get_called_class();
00380             $_model = new $_modelClass;
00381             $_transaction = $_model->getDbConnection()->beginTransaction();
00382             array_push( self::$_transactionStack, $_transaction );
00383         }
00384 
00385         return $_transaction;
00386     }
00387 
00393     public static function commitTransaction()
00394     {
00395         if ( null !== ( $_transaction = array_pop( self::$_transactionStack ) ) ) $_transaction->commit();
00396     }

00403     public static function rollbackTransaction( Exception $exception = null )
00404     {
00405         if ( null !== ( $_transaction = array_pop( self::$_transactionStack ) ) ) $_transaction->rollback();
00406 
00407         //  Throw it if given
00408         if ( null !== $exception ) throw $exception;
00409     }

00419     public function getRestAttributes()
00420     {
00421         if ( method_exists( $this, 'attributeRestMap' ) )
00422         {
00423             $_resultList = array( );
00424             $_columnList = $this->getSchema();
00425 
00426             foreach ( $this->attributeRestMap() as $_key => $_value )
00427             {
00428                 $_attributeValue = $this->getAttribute( $_key );
00429 
00430                 //  Apply formats
00431                 switch ( $_columnList[$_key]->dbType )
00432                 {
00433                     case 'date':
00434                     case 'datetime':
00435                     case 'timestamp':
00436                         //  Handle blanks
00437                         if ( null !== $_attributeValue && $_attributeValue != '0000-00-00' && $_attributeValue != '0000-00-00 00:00:00' ) $_attributeValue = date( 'c', strtotime( $_attributeValue ) );
00438                         break;
00439                 }
00440 
00441                 $_resultList[$_value] = $_attributeValue;
00442             }
00443 
00444             return $_resultList;
00445         }
00446 
00447         return null;
00448     }

00454     public function setRestAttributes( $attributeList )
00455     {
00456         if ( method_exists( $this, 'attributeRestMap' ) )
00457         {
00458             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, '  - Setting REST attributes' );
00459 
00460             $_map = $this->attributeRestMap();
00461 
00462             foreach ( $attributeList as $_key => $_value )
00463             {
00464                 if ( false !== ( $_mapKey = array_search( $_key, $_map ) ) ) $this->setAttribute( $_mapKey, $_value );
00465             }
00466 
00467             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, '  - REST attributes set' );
00468         }
00469     }
